definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

pinyin: luan4 gao3 nan2 nu:3 guan1 xi4

sentences.english: A married man may have his hands full if he has han-ky panky going on.
sentences.chinese: 已婚男人如果有其它男女關係，一定也很忙碌。

sentences.english: Another type of settling for less than you deserve is being involved in unhealthy relationships.
sentences.chinese: 另一種形式是，捲入不健康男女關係之中。

sentences.english: He is known for his sharp humour and caustic analysis of contemporary relationships between men and women.
sentences.chinese: 陳村對當代男女關係的描寫以幽默和犀利的分析著稱。

sentences.english: I hear you've been messing with married women in spite of my advice.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說你竟不顧我的忠告和有夫之婦亂搞男女關係。

sentences.english: Don't mess about with married women,it's unlawful.
sentences.chinese: 不要和有夫之婦亂搞男女關係，這樣做是違法的。

sentences.english: Still, domestic abuse within intimate relationships poses a greater threat to women than to men.
sentences.chinese: 更勝，男女關係中女性更喜歡使用家庭暴力。

definition: to force someone to do something
to confuse one thing with another (idiom); to muddle
to obstinately persist in going about things the wrong way (idiom)
lit. two armies have equivalent banners and drums (idiom); fig. evenly matched/roughly comparable (opponents)
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
